newsitem.title: USA: Kerr-McGee names Luke Corbett chairman,CEO.
newsitem.headline: Kerr-McGee names Luke Corbett chairman,CEO.

text.p: Kerr-McGee Corp said on Monday it has named Luke Corbett chairman and chief executive officer, succeeding Frank McPherson.
McPherson has retired after 14 years as chairman and chief executive.
Tom McDaniel, previously senior vice president and corporate secretary, was named vice chairman, Kerr-McGee said.
